description: |First digit - second digit + third digit - fourth digit ...| = 7.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Do[ a = IntegerDigits[ n ]; l = Length[ a ]; e = o = {}; Do[ o = Append[ o, a[[ 2k - 1 ] ]], {k, 1, l/2 + .5} ]; Do[ e = Append[ e, a[[ 2k ] ]], {k, 1, l/2} ]; If[ Abs[ Apply[ Plus, o ] - Apply[ Plus, e ]] == 7, Print[ n ]], {n, 1, 1000} ]Select[Range[1000],Abs[Total[Times@@@Partition[Riffle[IntegerDigits[#],{1,-1},{2,-1,2}],2]]]==7&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 05 2013 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 10 2001
